>

> 1 hour ago, romanasul said:
> 
> 
> Is there a link where I can download an older version of CMES for KSP 1.2.2, I want to use it with Realism Overhaul.
> 

What breaks when you try to roll the current version back to 1.2.2?

I might be able to quickly produce a custom version for you with the appropriate dependencies yet with the benefits of the current products. 

**Edited <time datetime="2017-10-07T19:30:19Z" title="10/07/2017 07:30  PM" data-short="6 yr">October 7, 2017</time> by YANFRET**
Nevermind, I tried the latest version and it works well. I just assumed that there might be problems.

I just find a problem that I can't store experiments and the pod doesn't have "crew report" to get science points.

of course in sandbox mode this not a problem.![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

> 
>

> 
> 
> I just find a problem that I can't store experiments and the pod doesn't have "crew report" to get science points.
>

> 

Good point! We can fix that. 

They were removed a few versions back when the number and order of modules had been an issue.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-10-12T22:51:23Z" title="10/12/2017 10:51  PM" data-short="6 yr">October 12, 2017</time> by YANFRET**

Will this ever work with 1.2.2 because I would love to use this for my <abbr style="background-color:#ffffff;border-bottom:none;color:#353c41;font-size:14px;" title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr> install.

Hi everybody =)

I've just recently started using Chaka Monkey Evolution 131 X and was wondering if there's an <abbr title="Module Manager (mod)">MM</abbr> patch somewhere to make its built-in (?) life-support  and recycling (food, water, oxygen,co2 and wastewater) geared towards <abbr title="Umbra Space Industries (a collection of mods)">USI</abbr>-LS? =">

Regards and thanks in advance

**SLS - Orion Max captures Station hardware for transit to Mun**

![omax.jpg](https://image.ibb.co/nav1fb/omax.jpg)

![s1.jpg](https://image.ibb.co/m2eK0b/s1.jpg)

![screenshot36.png](https://image.ibb.co/gci40b/screenshot36.png)

<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/xyjOjT8d8RI?feature=oembed" width="480"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2017-10-14T05:41:32Z" title="10/14/2017 05:41  AM" data-short="6 yr">October 14, 2017</time> by YANFRET**
Does the SET-IVA for Orion not work? There are no Portraits of the crew to click.

>

**Chaka Monkey 131 X Patch II**

**Fixes both ALCOR IVA in alternate Orion pod as well as science container issues. Merge with GameData folder:**

**► [https://www.dropbox.com/s/4bbst0ctc39g9pz/Science Patch II.zip?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/4bbst0ctc39g9pz/Science%20Patch%20II.zip?dl=0) ◄**

These will be included in the next update but for now that will do.
